title: NEW TOOL: Berries Helper üçì
content: Hi guys! I've finally released a berries helper in the website. The tool will receive some fixes and improvements. Gracidea still needs to be implemented. OH! We also got breadcrumbs! Now you can move better inside the website! As always, for every question, contact me on Discord. You can see my ID here in the bottom of this popup!

title: Update to New Lunar Year 2023
content: The website has been updated with the newest Pokedex and Cosmetics official update.
